Text.Page: <PCNAME>! I need your help again.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What did you find?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

The navashad that keeps chewing up our forces isn't sentient or magical. The argons use their technology to control its tentacles.

If you kill those controllers, the argon war machine would be helpless. I saw Nauti, one of the zariiks, using the navashad."I'll handle it."
You did it! The navashad has stopped! Without those colossal metal arms wreaking havoc on our forces, we stand a chance here.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"We need to stop it permanently."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

True enough. I don't know what powers the navashad, but I'll make finding the source the top priority for our vanguards.

Great work, .
